mireka.address

Class DomainPostmaster

  • Object
    • mireka.address.DomainPostmaster
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Recipient, RemotePartContainingRecipient

    public class DomainPostmaster
extends Object
implements RemotePartContainingRecipient
    represents the special "Postmaster@"domain recipient. This is always treated case-insensitively.
    See Also:
    RFC 5321 4.1.1.3
